name: 没有被美女包围的三角恋
name_original: 没有被美女包围的三角恋
description:
This is a love interactive story game, in the game you will play a male role, through their own choices, to determine the direction of the plot.

In the face of the emergence of the opposite sex, unexpected situations, your choice is crucial

After unlocking the game, you will enter the story of the game by watching a short live drama and become the hero of the game. Make choices about the story you're facing.
I hope that you have played the game in the communication with the opposite sex will no longer fall into the awkward situation of sudden quiet air

Product Features

· The whole first perspective, immersive love experience - the whole process is shot from the first-person perspective, completely immersed in the scene interaction and real person simulation. It can put you in it, experience the stories and scenes that really happen in life, let you try more, and have an immersive love experience with the girl you want.


· Multiple branches, multiple endings, multiple hidden storylines and eggs - the product has designed multiple story branches for you to support mining and multiple experiences. In the product, make the most in line with the choice, rather than the most likely to be the right choice, the game life is more diverse.

· Live performance, live shooting - all live actors
